A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This episode did follow the theme from empire strikes back it did not keep up the same tone. Throughout the movie it felt more like a comedy than a more serious Star Wars movie. In addition there where many questionable choices made and left me with an uneasy feeling. The characters feel like they only react to everything and don’t have that great character interaction that they tended to have in the OT. I’d also like to point out that the score for this movie is lower than the prequels
